notes.title: Institutional Review Board Statement
notes.p: The study was conducted according to the internationally accepted guidelines OECD 236 and OECD 420, and approved by the Animal Ethics Committee of the Faculty of Veterinary Medicine (Permit No. R8/2563, 17 July 2020) and the Faculty of Medicine, Chiang Mai University, Thailand (Permit No. 22/2563, 9 July 2020), respectively.
